Simon Marqvard Jensen

Researcher interested in the intersection between humans and technology. Dual masters degree holder with a MPS in Interactive Technology from New York University and a MSc.in Human Physiology from University of Copenhagen. Interested in using coding platforms and computer science to explore, create and promote new insight, design and content that impact humans. This page is intended to display some of my current and previous projects.
